verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: Praise be to God, Lord of the Universes.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: Praise be to Allah, Lord of the Universes.

verses.verseString: The Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
Sovereign of the Day of Judgment.
It is You we worship, and You we ask for help.
Guide us along the Straight Path.
The path of those You have blessed, not of the condemned, nor of the astrayed.
